<FREE, NO ADS & DO NOT COLLECT DATA >

Protect your privacy with WhatsApp Blur Chats, the ultimate tool for safeguarding your WhatsApp Web conversations. This extension automatically blurs your chat messages, ensuring your private conversations stay hidden from prying eyes. Whether you're in a public space or simply want extra privacy, WhatsApp Blur Chats gives you control over your chat visibility with a simple toggle.

Key Features:
- One-click activation to blur all chat messages on WhatsApp Web.
- Seamless integration with WhatsApp Web for enhanced privacy.
- Easy toggle to enable or disable blurring as needed.
- Intuitive design with minimal impact on your browsing experience.
- Keep your conversations private, secure, and protected.

Download WhatsApp Blur Chats today and take control of your chat privacy.
